title: Limon's legacy
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, Marvin A Lipman and George A. Dolney
brief_description: Jose Limon who died in 1962 was a major dancer and choreographer from the second generation of modern American dancers, and his works reflected both the tragedy and grandeur of the human spirit. He saw dance as a “vision of ineffable power”. Segments of Limon’s choreography are presented.
